description: The Men’s Summit Series FUTUREFLEECE™ Pants have an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for coverage in extreme environments. With a soft next-to-skin feel, hand pockets, and a smaller zip pocket, these pants are a perfect addition to any expedition kit. You can even wear them on their own while relaxing at basecamp.
name: The North Face Summit FutureFleece Pants, Reg - Mens
